OrgName.entry: FOXHILL AND PARSON CROSS ADVICE SERVICE

Desc.entry: Offers advice in the following areas: benefits, employment, housing, consumer, tax, debt, child support, relationship breakdown, etc. Home visits within the catchment area only. Helps with reviews and represents at tribunals. Specialist workers for benefits and debt. Runs outreach sessions for parents with children aged under 5 years at Meadows Childrens Centre, Foxhill School, Angram Bank Children's Centre, Monteney Children's Centre and the Early Day Centre (please see separate entries).

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Tues & Thurs 10am-12noon (drop-in advice sessions). Please ring to make an appointment if help needed with filling out Disability Living Allowance, Attendance Allowance or Incapacity Benefit forms
